verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: the U.S. is " having very productive talks with North Korea " about a summit next month with Kim Jong Un] , and says it could happen June 12 , the date that was under consideration before Trump abruptly canceled the summit Thursday .

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — President Donald Trump says the U.S. [V: is] " having very productive talks with North Korea " about a summit next month with Kim Jong Un , and says it could happen June 12 , the date that was under consideration before Trump abruptly canceled the summit Thursday .
